text: Louis Gaillard, probably in 1898 Père Louis Gaillard (1850–1900) was a 19th- century French sinologist and Jesuit missionary who studied notably Nankin, Shandong (Yantai), Guangdong (Pearl River) and more generally China. title: Père Louis Gaillard
